content.text:
# The Cattle King

The Cattle King is an Australian biography of Sidney Kidman.
Idriess researched and wrote it through 1935. It was difficult for him to write, in part due to lack of help from Kidman.
Reception
It was one of Ion Idriess' best selling books.
References
External links
* [http://www.idriess.com.au/thecattleking.htm The Cattle King] at Ion Idriess Fanpage
* [http://mpegmedia.abc.net.au/rural/telegraph/201108/r808118_7188024.mp3 ABC Radio program on The Cattle King from 2011]
